      • getConfiguredParser

        protected static javax.xml.parsers.SAXParser getConfiguredParser()
        utility class to create & configure our SAXParser for us. We configure the parser by telling it not to check against a specific DTD, since ASSET was repeatedly falling over when unable to find the indicated DTD
        Returns:
        a configured parser
